      • fetch

        private double fetch(java.lang.String name)
        Given the name of a variable, return its value. It is an error if the variable has not been given a value.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • store

        private void store(java.lang.String name,
         double value)
        Stores the given value in the named variable. If the variable does not previously exist, it is created.
        Parameters:
        name - The variable whose value is to be changed.
        value - The value to be given to the variable.

      • callProcedure

        private void callProcedure(java.lang.String name,
                 Tree<Token> actualParameterListNode)
        Does all the work required to call a Logo procedure. Specifically, it:
        • Uses the procedure name to find its procedure body,
        • Creates a HashMap for the procedure's local variable,
        • Pushes the HashMap onto the stack of HashMaps,
        • Evaluates each actual parameter, and store the value in the HashMap for the corresponding formal parameter,
        • Interprets the procedure body, and
        • Pops the procedure's HashMap from the stack of HashMaps.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the procedure to be interpreted.
        actualParameterListNode - The list of actual parameters.

      • findAllProcedures

        private void findAllProcedures(Tree<Token> listOfProcedures)
        Finds all the procedures in the parse tree and puts references to them in the global variable procedures.
        Parameters:
        listOfProcedures - The root of the tree of procedures.

      • getStringFrom

        private static java.lang.String getStringFrom(Tree<Token> node)
        Returns the String in the Token in the given node.
        Parameters:
        node - The Tree from which to extract the String.
        Returns:
        The String value in this Tree node.

        Parameters:
